uk.ac.uea.framework

Interface Input

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidInput

    public interface Input
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for handling user input

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Input.TouchEvent
      Static nested class that deals with the data associated with touch events and their location

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Input.TouchEvent> getTouchEvents()
      Returns a list of touch events
      int getTouchX(int pointer)
      Method that returns x co-ordinate of the touch event
      int getTouchY(int pointer)
      Method that returns y co-ordinate of the touch event
      boolean isTouchDown(int pointer)
      Asks whether specific touch event is down

    • Method Detail

      • isTouchDown

        boolean isTouchDown(int pointer)
        Asks whether specific touch event is down
        Parameters:
        pointer - identifier for touch event, should be used to refer to fingers on a touch screen
        Returns:
        true if the touch event at the pointer is down, otherwise false

      • getTouchX

        int getTouchX(int pointer)
        Method that returns x co-ordinate of the touch event
        Parameters:
        pointer -
        Returns:
        x-coordinate of touch event

        int getTouchY(int pointer)
        Method that returns y co-ordinate of the touch event
        Parameters:
        pointer -
        Returns:
        y-coordinate of touch event

        Returns a list of touch events
